channel.title: Spritely (or ocaps or virtual worlds) BoF?
channel.description:
Just curious if anyone is interested in one or more BoFs on: Spritely, virtual worlds, or ocaps on the fediverse. Could be one or multiple.
There will of course already be the [Q&A session about the Spritely talk](https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/t/spritely-and-federation-futures/932) so maybe more is not needed. Unsure. But unsurprisingly I'm interested in conversations about all these.
What do people think?

item.title: Spritely (or ocaps or virtual worlds) BoF?
item.dc:creator: rzr
item.description:
yes i am also interested, I hacked small PoCs with Mozilla hubs and i should be able to bridge this to AP too:

peertube.mastodon.host

web-of-twins-hubs-ow2con-2020-rzr

https://purl.org/rzr/weboftwins#

item.description:
I’d be interested! You probably could’ve guessed that though.

Looking forward to the Q&A in either case though!
